name: aimx
description: A terminal tool for AIM projects

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && cd ui && bun run build && cd .. && tsup --config tsup.config.ts
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd ui && bun run dev" "tsup --config tsup.config.ts --watch --no-dts"
scripts.dev:test: concurrently "bun run dev" "wait-on dist/index.mjs && bun --watch run ./dist/index.mjs start -d ../start-here/examples/ --ui"
scripts.build-binary: bun run typecheck && bun build ./index.ts --compile --outfile aimx
scripts.release: bun run cleanup && bun run build && changeset publish
scripts.version:beta: changeset pre enter beta && changeset version
scripts.release:beta: changeset pre exit && bun run build && changeset publish --tag beta
